courses.title: BIM Fundamentals for Engineers
courses.description: Comprehensive introduction to Building Information Modeling concepts, workflows, and best practices. Perfect for engineers transitioning to BIM.

courses.title: Advanced Revit for Infrastructure
courses.description: Master Autodesk Revit for civil infrastructure projects. Learn advanced modeling techniques, families, and project coordination.

courses.title: Navisworks Clash Detection
courses.description: Learn clash detection, coordination review, and 4D simulation using Autodesk Navisworks Manage.

courses.title: Civil 3D for Site Development
courses.description: Complete training on AutoCAD Civil 3D for site grading, corridors, pipe networks, and construction documentation.

courses.title: Infrastructure Project Management
courses.description: Learn project management principles specific to infrastructure projects, including scheduling, budgeting, and risk management.

courses.title: BIM Management & Leadership
courses.description: Develop skills to lead BIM implementation, manage teams, and drive digital transformation in your organization.
